column2: You can order unlanded courtiers to take the vows and to join a monastic order of their choice. Becoming a canon or canoness.
You can order unlanded courtiers to become ordained and join a monastic order of their choice. Becoming a regularis or regulara.
Become Ordained as a Canon or Canoness.
Become Ordained as a Regularis or Regulara.
